hanzi-su-wiki:
嘱

Значения

Поручать, доверять

Мнемоника

Оглашать 口 завещание о том, кому принадлежит 属 наследство.

Варианты

囑
purpleculture_pinyin:
zhǔ
to enjoin; to implore; to urge
предписывать; умолять; чтобы призвать
rtega_mnemonic:
囑囑RS
嘱嘱		order, tell, instruct, leave word, request, entrust
  • mouth 口 ordering or instructing the lower classes 屬/属 which are being entrusted a task
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 囑)
Pictophonetic: 属 indicates the sound; 口 (mouth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
嘱咐 [ zhǔ fù ]: to tell; to exhort; injunction
叮嘱 [ dīng zhǔ ]: to warn repeatedly; to urge; to exhort again and again
遗嘱 [ yí zhǔ ]: testament; will
嘱托 [ zhǔ tuō ]: to entrust a task to sb else
医嘱 [ yī zhǔ ]: prescription (medicine); doctor's advice
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 口 [ kǒu ] mouth; entrance, gate, opening
    • 属 [ shǔ ] class, category, type; family; affiliated, belonging to
heisig_chinese_memo: Since children belong to parents they can get admonished when naughty things come out of their mouths.
heisig_constituent: entrust, mouth, belong, flag, gnats, drop, insect, belt
koohiiStory1: Entrust is to confer trust in someone else. My mouth belongs to you and your secret is safely entrusted with me.
koohiiStory2: If you entrust me with something, my mouth belongs to you.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you want to take a flag out of the mouth of a mantis you have to make a formal request first. Mantises don't like to just give things away, and they're kind of mean so if you try to steal the flag it will probably bite you. So make a formal, polite request if you want it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine trying to request a flag from a scary mantis that has it sitting in it's mouth. Will it give it to you? Will it bite you? You'll have to wait and see.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: After you request the mantis give you its flag it shocks (しょく) you by actually spitting it out of its mouth at your feet. You didn't think your request would work, or even if the mantis understood human speech, but it shocked you by doing exactly what you asked!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine your shock at finding out the mantis not only understood your request, but agreed! This is great but also makes you wonder what other creatures can understand you...
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 属 (つく、ゾク、ショク принадлежать, относиться).
Ru_Words:
嘱するしょくする
  • поручать, передавать
    • 嘱目しょくもく
  • внимание
    • 嘱託しょくたく
  • поручение
  • сокр. внештатный сотрудник, сотрудник для особых поручений
    • 委嘱いしょく
    依嘱いしょく
  • поручение
    • 依嘱するいしょくする
    委嘱するいしょくする
  • вверять, возлагать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: what belongs to (属) the mouth (口) is entrusted to it
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Since children belong to parents they can get admonished when naughty things come out of their mouths.

嘱

zhǔ
托付，告诫：遗嘱（人死前托付的话）。医嘱。叮嘱。嘱咐。嘱托。嘱告。千叮万嘱。

［《廣韻》之欲切，入燭，章。］

(2)托付；委托。

Name meaning
It means to entrust, order, remind, and admonish.
嘱
形声字。口表意,其形像张开的口,表示开口托付;屬(属zha)表声,属有托付、连缀义,表示托付必相及于人。声旁简
化。本义是口头托付。
盼咐;托咐:叮~「遗~。

Пиктофонетические символы.
Рот выражает смысл, и его образ подобен открытому рту, что означает открытие, чтобы доверять; принадлежность (принадлежность к zha) выражает, принадлежит к доверию и значение сопряжения, означает, что доверие должно быть связано и упрощено.
Первоначальное значение - словесное доверие.

zhǔ
гл.
велеть, наказывать, давать наказ; приказывать; поручать; завещать; внушать; наставлять
嘱以努力学习 наказывать быть усердным в учении
Radicals: 口, 尸, 禹  (mouth, flag, mantis)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you want to take a flag out of the mouth of a mantis you have to make a formal request first. Mantises don't like to just give things away, and they're kind of mean so if you try to steal the flag it will probably bite you. So make a formal, polite request if you want it.
Imagine trying to request a flag from a scary mantis that has it sitting in it's mouth. Will it give it to you? Will it bite you? You'll have to wait and see.
Reading Mnemonic
After you request the mantis give you its flag it shocks (しょく) you by actually spitting it out of its mouth at your feet. You didn't think your request would work, or even if the mantis understood human speech, but it shocked you by doing exactly what you asked!
Imagine your shock at finding out the mantis not only understood your request, but agreed! This is great but also makes you wonder what other creatures can understand you...
